channel.title: Newton-Raphson Method on Amit Rajan
channel.description: Recent content in Newton-Raphson Method on Amit Rajan

item.title: Logistic Regression
item.description: In a classification setting, logistic regression models the probability of a response $Y$ belonging to a particaular category. A simple linear regression can not be used for classification as the output of a linear regression can have a range that goes from $-\infty$ to $\infty$ (we need to find the values in the range [0, 1]). Instead, we can transform the output of linear regression such that the output is confined in the range [0, 1].
